article.headline: UNLV 76, Montana St. 65
article.story: LAS VEGAS (AP) -- Senior guard Curtis Terry scored a career-high and game-high 26 points, including 20 in the second half to lead UNLV past Montana State 76-65 Friday night in the team's opening game. Terry was 9-of-12 from the field, including 2-of-3 from 3-point range. Also for the Rebels, from the Mountain West, Wink Adams added 11 points and six rebounds. For Montana State, from the Big Sky Conference, Branden Johnson led with 16 points. Divaldo Mbunga added 14 points and seven rebounds, while Carlos Taylor and Mecklen Davis had 11 points apiece. The Rebels jumped to a 17-4 advantage to start and never let the lead get below 11 the rest of the first half. UNLV led 40-26 at halftime. The Rebels built their largest lead at 48-28 with 17:16 remaining. But the Bobcats went on a 24-9 run to cut the lead to five points on two occasions, the last at 62-57 with 3:57 left. UNLV pulled away the rest of the way extending the advantage to 71-59 with 1:23 to go. For the game, UNLV from the field shot 26-of-62 for 42 percent, while the Bobcats were 23-of-64 for 36 percent. Montana States free-throw shooting kept them in the game, going 16-of-21 for 76 percent, while the Rebels were 19-of-27 for 70 percent. Before the game, UNLV raised its banner from last season with Mountain West Conference Tournament championship and Sweet 16 appearance.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
